description:
The legendary "Ray Day" signifies the perfect moment to conquer the High Sierras on a northbound PCT journey, start any hike with these socks to elevate your trail experience. With their lightweight and breathable construction, your feet will stay fresh long after your last shower.

  • Made of merino wool, nylon and spandex
  • Performance fit guarantees a snug, slip-free, and blister-resistant hiking experience
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Ray Day Cushion Micro Crew Socks - Women's
